overview: These young vultures always want something. "Loan me money? Let me borrow your car? Can I crash at your place?" Daddy Lance is sick and tired of being the nice guy. You want something from him? Well, you'll have to Beg! Motherfucker. Drop your pants, spread your tight young asshole, and beg for Daddy to wreck your hole. You want a couple of bucks? Beg him to cum in your dirty hole, whore boy. Bonus: Also features a copy of Rocco Steele's Cell Block D for exxxtra fun.
title: Beg! Motherfucker
